Package com.evanv.taskapp.ui.main.recycler

Class EventItemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventItemAdapter.EventViewHolder>
      • com.evanv.taskapp.ui.main.recycler.EventItemAdapter
  • public class EventItemAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventItemAdapter.EventViewHolder>
    Adapter to interface between data in EventItems and recyclerview in DayItem
    Author:
    Evan Voogd

        public EventItemAdapter​(java.util.List<EventItem> eventItemList,
                        ClickListener listener,
                        int day,
                        TextView header,
                        Activity activity)
        Constructs an adapter for a given DayItem's event recyclerview
        Parameters:
        eventItemList - the list of events for this day
        listener - ClickListener to handle button clicks
        header - TextView representing the header whose visibility will be changed depending on this adapter
